light_armor.name: Light Armor
light_armor.desc: Armor meant for light ships. Prioritises protection and low weight.

medium_armor.name: Medium Armor
medium_armor.desc: Middle-weight armor that lasts for a while. Decent protection and durability.

heavy_armor.name: Heavy Armor
heavy_armor.desc: Thick armor. Greatly interferes with dodging, but makes up for it in sheer protection.
